headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Buzzer Beater
content:
Come one, come all: the entertainment spectacle of the millennium has just got even bigger.

Buzzer Beater is the brand new mode in Arena War, a fast-paced race against the clock and every other lunatic in a riderâ€™s seat where your countdown ends with a serious bang.

Head over to the Arena War Series blip to get stuck into the action.
